long_description: The boys' Atlas Spark snowshoes enable young boys to keep up with the adults, offering great flotation and traction for exploring winter terrain. Lightweight aluminum frames and tough decking meet all weather conditions and provide lasting performance for dependable flotation. Grom bindings secure feet comfortably and adjust easily with nylon webbing straps; padded instep strap ensures a snug, cozy fit for kids' winter shoes and boots. Tempered-steel toe crampons offer positive traction for climbing; tempered steel crampons under heels add grip. Recommended for children ages 8 - 12 or a weight load of 50 - 120 lbs. (including weight of the child with their gear).
